Package shared.model.map

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Edge
    Class That represents the edges of the map (where you can build roads) The location and direction cannot change after setup Once a road is built on the edge it never changes
    GameMap
    The class that represents the map of the game.
    NumberChit
    A class that holds the number assigned to each terrain hex.
    Road
    The Road is always on an Edge The road is located on a border between hex locations.
    Robber
    Class representing the Robber.
    TerrainHex
    The TerrainHex class represents a hexagonal map section It will have a NumberChit unless it is of type DESERT Its location, number and type do not change during the game.
    Vertex
    The vertex class represents the corners of the terrain hexes where a building may be built or a port may exist.
